summary: SummaryBeast's Exfoliating Face Wash, with jojoba, is an invigorating-at-first-sniff face scrubber that awakens the senses while clearing away dead skin cells and dirt to usher forth a renewed, energized, clear-faced character.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsJojobaGinsengGreen teaCaffeineSugarcaneItem 2583251How To UseWork into lather on face. Rinse. Towel dry. Look in mirror. Glorious. Use daily for best results.Keep out of eyes.IngredientsWater, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Acrylates/Palmeth-25 Acrylate Copolymer, Glycerin, Decyl Glucoside, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Wax, Butylene Glycol, PEG-18 Glyceryl Oleate/Cocoate, Panthenol, Phospholipids, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Glycol Stearate, Peg-20 Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Polyquaternium-7, Dimethyl Sulfone, Gamma Polyglutamic Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Paullinia Cupana (Guarana) Extract, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugarcane) Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Cupressus Sempervirens Leaf/Nut/Stem Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Retinyl Palmitate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Sodium Chloride, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tetrasodium EDTA, Citric Acid.
how_to_use: Work into lather on face. Rinse. Towel dry. Look in mirror. Glorious. Use daily for best results.Keep out of eyes.

reviews.headline: Best I ever had
reviews.comments: I received a tube of this as a gift.   Thought it was a gimmick.  Nope.   This stuff works great.   I have tried many products but for my skin, this one works the best.  My skin feels fresh and renewed after using.   Today, I ran out of shave cream.  I knew this face wash had a very lubricating feel.  I lathered up with a wash cloth as usual and broke out the 5 bladed field cutter.  Fantastic.  Worked better than gel shave cream and did not clog up the blades.  Off-label use?  Yep.  But it works.

reviews.headline: LOVE this face wash
reviews.comments: Very light on the exfoliation, so I wouldn't recommend buying it solely for the scrub. I love using this face wash in the shower at night. It's the perfect relaxing spa-like scent and provides a good clean. Lasts a long time!

reviews.headline: Not so sure about it.
reviews.comments: I've used this off and on trying to decide if I like it or not. It has a weird smell. Everytime the next day I end up with a pimple, rare I have a pimple in general. Bought for my teen son, he doesn't like it at all. Wasn't for our family, but isn't the worst there is.
